problem: Develop a feature-rich asynchronous Discord music bot (ZMusic) focused on YouTube playback with dual command interfaces (prefix/slash), an interactive player UI with a live progress bar, advanced queue management, video screensharing, permissions, and more.
context: The bot needs to be robust, well-commented, modular (using discord.py Cogs), and handle potential Discord rate limits, especially for the live progress bar update. Key libraries: discord.py v2+, yt-dlp, asyncio. External dependency: ffmpeg.
